trans-unit.source: The exception that is generated when a warning or error is returned by an Oracle database or the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle.
trans-unit.target: 当 Oracle 数据库或用于 Oracle 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序返回警告或错误时生成的异常。

trans-unit.source: This class is created whenever the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> encounters a situation that it cannot handle.
trans-unit.target: 创建此类每当<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>遇到它无法处理的情况。

trans-unit.source: If the severity of the error is too great, the server may close the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果错误的严重程度太高，服务器可能会关闭 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>。

trans-unit.source: However, the user can reopen the connection and continue.
trans-unit.target: 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。

trans-unit.source: The following example generates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException> due to a missing database, and then displays the exception.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例生成<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleException>由于缺少的数据库，然后显示该异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets the code portion of the error as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 获取错误的整数形式的代码部分。

trans-unit.source: The code portion of the error as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 错误的整数形式的代码部分。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用关于异常的信息设置 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。
